# NewslyUSA

NewslyUSA is a comprehensive news platform delivering the latest updates across various categories including Technology, Politics, Business, Health, and more.

## Site Structure

- **Home**: https://newslyusa.com/
- **News Feed**: https://newslyusa.com/news
- **Categories**: https://newslyusa.com/[category-slug]
- **Articles**: https://newslyusa.com/[category-slug]/[article-slug]
- **Tags**: https://newslyusa.com/tags/[tag-name]

## Post Recommendations

- **Trending / Viral**: https://newslyusa.com/news (Section: "Trending Last Month")
- **Top Stories**: https://newslyusa.com/news (Sidebar: "Top Stories")

## Main Sections

- **Technology**: Latest in tech, AI, gadgets, and software.
- **Politics**: Global and local political news and analysis.
- **Business**: Market trends, finance, and corporate news.
- **Health**: Medical breakthroughs, wellness, and health tips.
- **Entertainment**: Movies, music, celebrity news, and more.

## API / RSS

- **Sitemap**: https://newslyusa.com/sitemap.xml

## About

NewslyUSA aims to provide unbiased, timely, and accurate news coverage to keep you informed about the world around you.
